When the Fence light is dimmed physically (COC Dim command), reduce the Master Fan Light brightness to 30%. Also, if the Den Night Light is off, set the Office Pole Lamp ramp rate to 1.0 minute.

Step-by-step reasoning:
- Condition 1: Fence sends Dim command (COC).
- Action 1: Set Master Fan Light On Level to 30% brightness.

- Condition 2: Den Night Light Status is 0 (off) (COS).
- Action 2: Set Office Pole Lamp Ramp Rate to 1.0 minute (enum 12).

- Two separate automations or combined with OR condition and conditional actions.
- Instructions say no nested if blocks, so create two separate routines.

Routine 1: Fence dim physically triggers Master Fan Light to 30% brightness.
Routine 2: Den Night Light off triggers Office Pole Lamp ramp rate to 1.0 minute.

Note: Master Fan Light does not have On Level property, only Status (Enum On/Off). So to set brightness, we can only turn On or Off. Since user wants brightness 30%, but device only supports On/Off, we interpret "reduce brightness" as turning On (since no brightness control). Alternatively, we can send On command (no parameter) to turn it on.

Hence, for Master Fan Light, just turn On if Fence dimmed.
